Posts.Content: Feb 16, 2011 12:52PM Sueinva wrote: I finished chemo last Friday, 2/11/11. Had been on carboplatin every 3 weeks since mid-October and on taxotere and herceptin weekly since then. I've gained 15-20 pounds and my face is so bloated! How easy or fast can I expect to lose this weight? Prior to the cancer discovery in early August 2010, I had been a distance runner and had lost 40 pounds in 2 years. So gaining the weight is by far my worst side effect. Thanks for any advice.
Posts.Title: Steroid weight gain Pinkprincess lisa2012
